Text: so many years trying tons of  stalker cs torrents and this finally works.no crashes,no 10 min loading screen
there's actually a "complete" mod for every version.  still no official word on Stalker 2.

I also made a call of pripyat complete version.

And when stalker lost alpha mod is released i will make a merged rip too :)
how close are they to getting the Lost Alpha mod done?  I haven't checked in a while...

There will be no Stalker 2, the company went bankrupt or something a while ago and everything got scrapped.

So enjoy what there is because there probably never will be such an atmospheric sandbox shooter like this awesome series again.
Oh, and thanks for the uploads, dude !
Hope you guys enjoy it and keep seeding for a while please
